contentrichtext.text: {{ sidebar | name = Numeral systems | class = hlist navbox | heading1 = [[Numeral system]]s by culture | content2 = ; [[Hindu–Arabic numeral system|Hindu–Arabic numerals]]: * [[Arabic numerals|Western Arabic]] * [[Eastern Arabic numerals|Eastern Arabic]] * [[Indian numerals|Indian family]] * [[Tamil numerals|Tamil]] * [[Telugu numerals|Telugu]] * [[Burmese numerals|Burmese]] * [[Sinhala numerals|Sinhala]] * [[Khmer numerals|Khmer]] * [[Lao alphabet#Numerals|Lao]] * [[Mongolian numerals|Mongolian]] * [[Thai numerals|Thai]] ; East Asian numerals: * [[Chinese numerals|Chinese]] * [[Japanese numerals|Japanese]] * ''[[Suzhou numerals|Suzhou]]'' * [[Korean numerals|Korean]] * [[Vietnamese numerals|Vietnamese]] * ''[[Counting rods]]'' ; Alphabetic numerals: * [[Abjad numerals|Abjad]] * [[Armenian numerals|Armenian]] * [[Āryabhaṭa numeration|{{IAST|Āryabhaṭa}}]] * [[Cyrillic numerals|Cyrillic]] * [[Ge'ez script#Numerals |Ge'ez]] * [[Greek numerals|Greek]] * [[Georgian numerals|Georgian]] * [[Hebrew numerals|Hebrew]] ; Other historical systems: * [[Aegean numerals|Aegean]] * [[Attic numerals|Attic]] * [[Babylonian numerals|Babylonian]] * [[Brahmi numeral|Brahmi]] * [[Egyptian numerals|Egyptian]] * [[Etruscan numerals|Etruscan]] * [[Inuit numerals|Inuit]] * [[Kharosthi numerals|Kharosthi]] * [[Maya numerals|Mayan]] * [[Quipu]] * [[Roman numerals|Roman]] | heading3 = [[Positional notation|Positional system]]s by [[Radix|base]] | content4 = [[Decimal]] (10) | content5 = * [[Unary numeral system|1]] * [[Binary number|2]] * [[Ternary numeral system|3]] * [[Quaternary numeral system|4]] * [[Quinary|5]] * [[Senary|6]] * [[Septenary|7]] * [[Octal|8]] * [[Nonary|9]] * [[Undecimal|11]] * [[Duodecimal|12]] * [[Base 13|13]] * [[Tetradecimal|14]] * [[Pentadecimal|15]] * [[Hexadecimal|16]] * [[Vigesimal|20]] * [[Base 24|24]] * [[Hexavigesimal|26]] * [[Septemvigesimal|27]] * [[Base 32|32]] * [[Base 36|36]] * [[Sexagesimal|60]] | content6 = [[Non-standard positional numeral systems]] | below = [[List of numeral systems]] }}<noinclude>{{doc|content= [[Category:Mathematics templates]] [[Category:Sidebar templates]] }}</noinclude>
